biz.femtosoft.fractal.domain
Class FractalCompressorFacade

java.lang.Object
  biz.femtosoft.fractal.domain.FractalCompressorFacade
All Implemented Interfaces:
IFractalCompressorFacade
public class FractalCompressorFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFractalCompressorFacade

This is the entry point to the domain layer. It fronts the compressor and decompressor, and manages the workflow (saving and reading files, etc.).

Author:
ken.delong
